  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was discovered by part time QA in unload and from there message was told to QA manager who placed it into QA cage for further inspection. DescribePack: The plastic top on plastic jug was cracked and broken. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Damage Hazmat was placed into hazmat bucket

item.title: Report X-2023101087
item.description:
Report X-2023101087

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: SPARTANBURG
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE UNLOADED FROM TRAILER LEAKING. HAZMAT-CERTIFIED ADMIN NOTIFIED OF LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE. DescribePack: BOTTOM OF BOTTLE PUNCTURED BY A LOOSE SCREW. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HAZMAT-CERTIFIED ADMIN USING PROPER PPE PLACED THE PACKAGE INSIDE A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND SECURED THE TOTE INSIDE THE HAZMAT CAGE.

item.title: Report X-2023101047
item.description:
Report X-2023101047

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: GREENVILLE
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED IN A RED HAZARDOUS MATERIALS TOTE WITHIN THE DESIGNATED HAZMAT CAGE. UNKNOWN WHERE THE SPILL ORIGINATED. SIDE OF THE OUTER PACKAGING IS DAMP AND FRAYING FROM SPILLAGE. PACKAGE WAS ORIGINALLY SCANNED A CODE 37 BY AN OPERATIONS ADMINISTRATOR. DescribePack: ALL 4 BOTTLES SHOW LEAKAGE OF CONTENTS FROM THE CAP. NO INNER PACKAGING TO PROTECT THE CONTENTS SUCH AS CORRUGATED LINERS, CAP SEALS/PROTECTION, ETCETERA. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED IN A RED TOTE IN THE CAGE ON THE APPROPRIATE CORROSIVE MATERIALS PALLET.

item.title: Report X-2023100937
item.description:
Report X-2023100937

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-09
  • City: LADSON
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package located at NC belt, strong odor; package separated from sortation. DescribePack: Loose lid allowed liquid contents toe scape. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in hazardous materials tub to prevent continued exposure.
